title: why did i get banned?
body: i havent played league of legends on my account since my best friend stopped playing league of legends i remember letting my brother play my account but i dont think he'd get my account perma banned i dont like being an asshole at any time even if their being an asshole back theres no sense its just gonna make them keep being an asshole

replies.body:
Login in and you will get your behavior reform card upon login.

It will show you exactly what you were penalized for.

Also, account sharing is a bannable offense, and you are always responsible for your account, regardless of who is playing it.
Allowing ANYONE, no matter how close to you, access to your account, is a bannable offense.

when you log in, what does it say?

specifically what year were you banned till? that's a code and can tell us why you were banned.
